headline: Did ONEOK's (OKE) New Governance Hires Just Reshape Its Boardroom Risk and Capital Playbook?
summary: ONEOK recently added two independent directors to its board, appointing former Weatherford CEO Mark A. McCollum and Mountaintop Consulting CEO Precious Williams Owodunni on January 23, 2026, while also tying them to key audit, governance, and compensation committees. The combination of deep energy-sector finance experience and boardroom governance expertise could influence how ONEOK oversees risk, capital allocation, and executive pay in the years ahead. Against this backdrop, we’ll explore...
